techmeme.title: xAI's Grok AI chatbot is now integrated with Telegram for Telegram Premium users, marking Grok's first big expansion beyond X (Andrew Hutchinson/Social Media Today)
Utah Gov. Spencer Cox signs a bill requiring Apple's and Google's mobile app stores to verify user ages and require parental consent for minors to use some apps (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
A US federal judge rejects OpenAI's request to dismiss the NYT's lawsuit, allowing the main copyright infringement claims to go forward while narrowing the suit (Bobby Allyn/NPR)
A software update for some Amazon Kindle models lets users double-tap the sides or back of the device to turn pages in books or scroll down in Home and Library (Michael Kozlowski/Good e-Reader)
DNI Tulsi Gabbard told a Congressional hearing that Signal comes "pre-installed" on government devices, hinting at a major shift following the Salt Typhoon hack (Maggie Miller/Politico)
